```{r}
library(survey)
library(srvyr)
```

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
nychvs <- read_rds("../../data/output/nychvs/nychvs2017.rds")
```

create an appropriate design object that contains the data variables and the replication weights metadata needed for valid estimation
```{r}
svy <- svrepdesign(variables = nychvs[ ,seq(19)], 
                    repweights = nychvs[ ,paste0("FW", seq(80))],
                    weights = ~hhweight,
                    combined.weights=TRUE,
                    type="Fay",
                    rho = (1-1/sqrt(4)),
                    scale = 4/80,
                    rscales = rep(1,80),
                    data = nychvs) %>%
      as_survey_rep()


```
